title: STAT+: Trump administration 340B pilot program is thwarted, for now, by a U.S. appeals court
description: A U.S. appeals court panel has refused to allow the Trump administration to proceed with a pilot initiative tied to a controversial federal drug discount program.
content: A U.S. appeals court panel has refused to allow the Trump administration to proceed with a pilot initiative tied to a controversial federal drug discount program.
